name: Tech Startup Payroll Credit
description: Payroll tax credit for qualified small businesses conducting R&D
ui_questions: What were your gross receipts for the year?
How many years has your business been active?
Did your R&D involve technological uncertainty?
Did you conduct a process of experimentation?
Was the work based on scientific or engineering principles?
What is your calculated R&D credit amount for the year?
What is your payroll tax liability for the quarter?
Do you have any unused credit to carry forward?
In which quarter did you file Form 6765 to elect the credit?
Which quarter are you applying the credit to?
human_summary: Payroll tax credit for young technology startups performing qualified R&D.
risk_notes: Ensure forms 6765, 8974, and 941 are filed and retain records of carryforward calculations.
